title: 🚚MOVE NOW! SOUTH SHORE 2BR NEAR 71ST & JEFFERY $1195
posting_body: ['ID: c202572n', 'Ready to move?', '"Virtual and video tours available!', 'Visit our website to view videos of our available apartments or call now to schedule a virtual tour!', 'All you need is an internet connection."', 'Call 312-428-4861 now to schedule an appointment to walk through your new, spacious, condo-grade apartment.', 'Bedrooms: 2', 'Address: Near 71st and Jeffery.', '☎', '312-428-4861 for more details!', 'Price: $1195 (756-801 sqft) ✰ Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', 'Building includes: On-site Laundry, Heat Included, Vinyl Plank Floor, Granite Countertops⋆Parking (fee required)', 'This apartment is in the South Shore (60649) neighborhood.', 'Very walkable and easily accessible by CTA bus lines.', '2027 E 72nd', 'St is a 10-minute walk from the ME Metra Electric at the South Shore stop.', 'Like what you see?', 'We have plenty of units available in Chicago, Park Forest, Sauk Village, West Austin, Maywood, Broadview, and many more.', '**NOTE**', 'If replying by email please remember to include your phone # and/or email address in your response so we can follow up with you directly.', '***Please note that photos are a representation of a model apartment and may not be pictures of the actual unit.', '"Pangea is an Equal Housing Opportunity provider".', 'Call 312-428-4861 to schedule a tour!', '"Pangea Real Estate practices on-going dynamic pricing for all operated units.', 'Unit promotions, discounts, and monthly rent quotes are subject to change based on day of month, current inventory, and additional market factors.', ' As such, any promotions, discounts, or monthly rent quotes are valid only at the time presented to a prospective tenant and can expire anytime thereafter."']
